product_name: REI CoolMax Eco Multisport Quarter Socks - 2012 Seconds
long_description: The REI CoolMax(R) Eco Multisport Quarter socks are made with EcoMade(TM) fabric made from recycled plastic bottles. CoolMax EcoMade fabric offers the same moisture-wicking, quick-drying performance as regular CoolMax, yet is made of recycled PET. Nylon adds durability and spandex offers stretch and shape retention. Mesh-knit toe and instep panels promote airflow and move moisture away from feet, keeping them dry and blister free. Fully cushioned bottoms and heels add shock absorption and protection from wear. Lin Toe(R) ''no feel'' seams reduce irritation and chafing along toes. Seconds; item has minor cosmetic imperfections that do not affect product performance.
short_description: The REI CoolMax(R) Eco Multisport Quarter socks are made with EcoMade(TM) fabric made from recycled plastic bottles.
